damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, subtract 5 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Few foes can stand up to the power of a Wraithknight. Those armed with a heavy wraithcannon can throw targets straight into the hell-dimension of the warp, while the suncannon can doom masses of soldiers in plasma blasts. Wraithknights that wield a ghostglaive and scattershield are amply equipped to duel even titanic war engines.

otherAbilities.Wraithbone Form:: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from that attack’s Damage characteristic.
otherAbilities.Agile:: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over other models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.
